meanings.definition: A type of printer that uses a jet of ink to produce images or text on paper.
meanings.sent1: I printed my essay using an inkjet.
meanings.sent2: The inkjet at the office is very fast.
meanings.sent3: The inkjet printer and the paper had a chat about their work.
meanings.sent4: The inkjet sprayed creativity all over the page.
meanings.sent5: The inkjet danced across the paper, leaving a trail of words behind.

meanings.definition: The liquid ink used in an inkjet printer.
meanings.sent1: I need to refill the inkjet in my printer.
meanings.sent2: The store sells different colors of inkjet.
meanings.sent3: The inkjet in the bottle giggled as it waited to be used.
meanings.sent4: The inkjet flowed smoothly onto the paper like a river.
meanings.sent5: The inkjet in the cartridge whispered promises of vibrant prints.
